title: Rishi Sunak – 2023 Statement on Accepting a Fine for Not Wearing a Seatbelt
author: admin
summary: The statement issued on behalf of Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, on 20 January 2023 following a fine for not wearing a seatbelt.
content:
The Prime Minister fully accepts this was a mistake and he has apologised. He will of course comply with the fixed penalty.
